title: Goldman Sachs
description: Goldman Sachs utilizes a sophisticated and professional color palette, predominantly featuring shades of blue and gray, as well as black and white accents. These colors reflect the firm's commitment to excellence and reliability in the financial sector. The palette includes the primary blue (#7399C6) and navy blue (#00355F), complemented by light blue (#ACD4F1), dark gray (#231F20), medium gray (#58575A), and white (#FFFFFF). The specific color information and usage guidelines can be found in their branding resources sourced from papirfly.com.
